articles.author: CBC News
articles.title: Trudeau 'sickened' by shooting at Trump during rally as Canadian leaders react | CBC News
articles.description: Prime Minister Justin Trudeau and other Canadian political leaders issued condemnations on Saturday after a suspected gunman shot at former U.S. president Donald Trump at a campaign rally in Pennsylvania.
articles.content:
Prime Minister Justin Trudeau and other Canadian political leaders issued condemnations on Saturday after a suspected gunman shot at former U.S. president Donald Trump at a campaign rally.

articles.title: Ex-classmate of Trump rally shooter describes him as "normal boy," rejected from high school rifle team
articles.description: An ex-classmate of the gunman who fired shots at former President Donald Trump described 20-year-old Thomas Matthew Crooks as a "normal boy."
articles.content: Washington — The gunman who fired shots at former President Donald Trump at his campaign rally in Butler, Pennsylvania, was rejected from his high school's rifle team, according to a former classmate… [+2895 chars]
